amendment.description: An amendment to strike all after the enacting clause and insert a new text of a bill entitled the NIST Small Business Cybersecurity Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Webster (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Webster (FL).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Webster (FL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Webster (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Webster (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
